original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1321)@</color> 以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(951)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並召喚 <color=#ccffcc>3</color> 隻<color=#4cc769>虎王</color>加入我軍。且在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4463)@</color> 秒內變大身軀強化 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4463)@</color> 點武力，同時提高所有異常狀態  <color=#ccffcc>40%</color> 抗性。<color=#4cc769>虎王</color>屬性<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1246)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1246)@</color>機率性發動特殊攻擊以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(671)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color> 對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害
